batch.subject: 05/09 Meeting Recap // BWM
batch.content:
Hi Haden and Jolie,
Key Updates

Our "Kitchen Convenience" campaign has shown promising results with three
out of the five ads currently still running successfully. We're seeing good
purchase metrics, but are also considering key performance indicators
beyond just purchase ROAS such as click-through rate and frequency.
Campaign Strategy

We're moving forward with shifting some focus towards the Andromeda-style
Facebook campaign to better align with Facebook's recommendations and
improve vital metrics for long-term success. We'll simultaneously limit the
Evergreen campaign without turning it off immediately to avoid sudden
transitions.
Creative Direction

We discussed the need for diversity in our ad visuals. Making use of more
lifestyle and moment-oriented imagery is underway, thanks to Dan's efforts
in capturing outdoor shots. We're also preparing new creatives for the
upcoming Sprint on the 19th that focus on the concept of pairing coffee
with life's moments.
✅ Action Items
Task Owner Due Date
Review new ad creatives Jolie & Hayden ASAP (In Progress)
Launch Andromeda-style campaign Matthew Liss Today (In Progress)
Reviewed new ad angles  Team Complete Additional Notes

I've also shared some navigation tips for managing notifications in
ClickUp. Feel free to adjust your settings to better manage your email
flow. If needed, I can offer further assistance in this area.

Thank you for the collaborative effort. Looking forward to our next
discussion and to seeing the creative endeavors come to fruition!

Best,
Matthew Liss

batch.subject: Re: Executive assistant for Matthew
batch.content:
Hi Matthew,

  
Thanks for getting back — glad to hear you're interested!

  

Let’s schedule a quick 15-minute call so I can walk you through how we help
free up your time from repetitive admin tasks, allowing you to focus on
higher-leverage work. I’ll also share how we’ve successfully supported similar
companies.

  

Would you be available for a quick call early next week?

  
If another time works better, feel free to let me know — or you can directly
grab a slot on my calendar here:
[calendly.com/akshatbiyani](http://calendly.com/akshatbiyani)

  

Looking forward to connecting!

  
Best regards,  
Akshat

  
  
---  
  
  

On May 09, 2025, at 10:00 PM, Elaine Delaney
<elainedelaney@heyclassetmatch.info> wrote:  
  

> Hi Matthew,  
>  
> Thanks for getting back to me. CCing our founder, Akshat.  
>  
> Here are two profiles of the top-tier Executive Assistant candidates, along
> with their resumes and intro videos attached below to get a feel for their

batch.subject: Executive assistant for Matthew
batch.content:
Dear Matthew,

I’m reaching out to share a standout Executive Assistant who’s available immediately to support senior leaders in marketing agencies. In fact, she previously supported companies that specialised in PPC and Content Writing.  

She’s highly organized, proactive, and skilled in managing calendars, comms, and team logistics — fully operating in your ET.  

Interested in reviewing her resume and intro video?  

Talk soon,
Elaine
Hey Recruiting

batch.subject: Meeting Prep: PerfSol / Blue water sync
batch.content:
[https://files.fireflies.ai/email-templates/img/logo-full-color.png]


UPCOMING MEETING: TIME TO PREPARE!

[https://files.fireflies.ai/email-templates/img/calendar-2x.png]

PerfSol / Blue water sync

Roman Poltavchenko|Today, 04:00 PM - 04:30 PM UTC



Catch up on your last meeting

PerfSol / Blue water sync
[https://app.fireflies.ai/view/01JSJ5G0M7XYFJGN27KQERXHC5?utm_content=email_prep]

Friday, April 25 2025|04:00 PM - 04:30 PM UTC|24 mins

[https://files.fireflies.ai/email-templates/img/sparkling-2x.png] Summary

During the Project Status Update meeting for the PerfSol / Blue Water project,
team members provided updates on critical aspects of the project. Serhii is
working to complete the dashboard by Monday, despite encountering database
issues and visual bugs. The discussion also covered the sourcing of benchmark
data, with a suggestion to extend the timeframe for averages while confirming
metrics with Chris. Challenges with image display, particularly regarding
Instagram content, were identified, leading Giovana to propose exploring
alternative API solutions. Furthermore, the team reached a consensus to rename
'Conversion Value' for alignment with Meta API terminology. The timeline for AI
feature implementation was also discussed, with Serhii committing to provide
estimates and deploy the project by Monday, including sharing an access link.
Action items were assigned to address technical challenges and finalize features
ahead of deadlines.

[https://files.fireflies.ai/email-templates/img/checkbox-2x.png] Action Items

Serhii Hupalo

 * Clarify benchmark calculations with Chris.
 * Finish dashboard implementation by Monday.
 * Deploy the project and send access link by Monday.
 * Check and implement thumbnail solution for video content.
 * Provide estimation for AI features on Monday.
 * Send example of Instagram link to Giovana for API investigation.



 * Research API solutions for accessing Instagram images.

Roman Poltavchenko

 * Update ClickUp with estimates for milestone two and remaining tasks.

Want to view full meeting? View Meeting
[https://app.fireflies.ai/view/01JSJ5G0M7XYFJGN27KQERXHC5?utm_content=email_prep]

Best,

Fireflies AI Assistant - Fred

batch.subject: Why Brands Need To Prepare For The Future Of Soccer
batch.content:
The time to build your soccer strategy is now



 
<https://www.adweek.com/webinars/why-brands-need-to-prepare-for-the-future-of-soccer/?sti=aw_blast1w>
 
<https://www.adweek.com/webinars/why-brands-need-to-prepare-for-the-future-of-soccer/?sti=aw_blast1w>



Why Brands Need to Prepare for the Future of Soccer


May 28, 2025
12 PM ET | 9 AM PT


Register  
<https://www.adweek.com/webinars/why-brands-need-to-prepare-for-the-future-of-soccer/?sti=aw_blast1w>

 

Soccer’s momentum in the U.S. is accelerating—and for brand advertisers, the 
time to act is now. As participation and fandom continue to rise leading into 
2026, brands that plan early and invest authentically will be best positioned 
to drive scalable, brand-safe growth.

Attend the webinar 
<https://www.adweek.com/webinars/why-brands-need-to-prepare-for-the-future-of-soccer/?sti=aw_blast1w>
 with leaders from e.l.f. Beauty, Footballco, and TeamSnap as they explore how 
today’s marketers are leveraging grassroots soccer, purpose-driven 
partnerships, and cultural alignment to build meaningful connections with 
families and communities.

Register  
<https://www.adweek.com/webinars/why-brands-need-to-prepare-for-the-future-of-soccer/?sti=aw_blast1w>

Sponsored By 

 
<https://www.adweek.com/webinars/why-brands-need-to-prepare-for-the-future-of-soccer/?sti=aw_blast1w>

See all upcoming and on-demand ADWEEK webinars. 
<https://www.adweek.com/webinars/>

<https://sli.adweek.com/click?s=1098754&dynamicSegment=AGENCY&e=matt@bluewatermarketing.com&p=05092025&lctg=ef52a02f-6b40-40ca-8aa8-576a3090d8a1&stpe=default>
 
<https://sli.adweek.com/click?s=1098755&e=matt@bluewatermarketing.com&p=05092025&lctg=ef52a02f-6b40-40ca-8aa8-576a3090d8a1&stpe=static>
 
<https://sli.adweek.com/click?s=1098757&dynamicSegment=AGENCY&e=matt@bluewatermarketing.com&p=05092025&lctg=ef52a02f-6b40-40ca-8aa8-576a3090d8a1&stpe=static>

TGIF, everybody.

What a crazy week. Feels like everyone had an event, including ADWEEK, which 
held itsMarketing Vanguard Summit in Chicago, where CMOs powwow behind closed 
doors to help troubleshoot professional issues and to talk frankly about their 
jobs.

Also, there were NewFronts.

And next week, we’re hosting one of our tentpole events: Social Media Week 
<https://event.adweek.com/smw_2025> which will be held in New York City at the 
Metropolitan Pavilion, and will feature speakers likeAmelia Dimoldenberg, 
Bethenny Frankel, Andrew Rea, and so many more.

Also, there will be Upfronts.

All of that, plus some major ad industry shakeups as GroupM (or WPP Media as 
it’s called these days, though that’s not been officially confirmed) started 
cutting staff, and there was a massive leadership shakeup atdentsu Americas’ 
media practice. 
Ryan Joe, editor in chief 


 Must Reads 

1. EXCLUSIVE: Layoffs Hit WPP Media Agencies Days After Reports of GroupM 
Rebrand



Massive changes are happening at WPP's media-buying arm GroupM. First it 
changed its storied name toWPP Media (Maybe. Unconfirmed by WPP. But not 
denied, just sayin).

And now, WPP Media is laying off staff. Many employees knew this was coming, 
but they're shocked by the abruptness of it, and not cool at all with the way 
it's going down. Our agency reporterAudrey Kemp has the inside details.



Read more 
<https://www.adweek.com/agencies/exclusive-layoffs-hit-wpp-media-agencies-days-after-reports-of-groupm-rebrand/>



2. Meta Launches Thread Video Ads and Revives Facebook Live Ads 



Meta released a bevy of new ad products at its NewFronts presentation. Didn't 
attend? Our tech reporterTrishla Ostwal can fill you in.



Read more 
<https://www.adweek.com/convergent-tv/meta-launches-thread-video-ads-and-revives-facebook-live-ads/>




 
<https://sli.adweek.com/click?s=1098749&dynamicSegment=AGENCY&e=matt@bluewatermarketing.com&p=05092025&lctg=ef52a02f-6b40-40ca-8aa8-576a3090d8a1&stpe=default>
 
<https://sli.adweek.com/click?s=1098749&dynamicSegment=AGENCY&e=matt@bluewatermarketing.com&p=05092025&lctg=ef52a02f-6b40-40ca-8aa8-576a3090d8a1&stpe=default>
 
<https://sli.adweek.com/click?s=1098750&dynamicSegment=AGENCY&e=matt@bluewatermarketing.com&p=05092025&lctg=ef52a02f-6b40-40ca-8aa8-576a3090d8a1&stpe=static>
 
<https://sli.adweek.com/click?s=1098752&dynamicSegment=AGENCY&e=matt@bluewatermarketing.com&p=05092025&lctg=ef52a02f-6b40-40ca-8aa8-576a3090d8a1&stpe=static>


3. Apple Mother's Day Ad Touts Its Vision Pro Headset as a New Way to Preserve 
Memories



Once again, Apple combines the emotional with the product demo in its new 
Mother's Day ad forApple Vision Pro. In the spot, a mother uses the headset to 
relive some of the most heartfelt moments she shared with her children.

More realistically, she could have used the headset to be on a solitary 
vacation all by herself.



Read more 
<https://www.adweek.com/brand-marketing/apple-mothers-day-ad-touts-its-vision-pro-headset-as-a-new-way-to-preserve-memories/>



4. McCann Worldgroup is Getting in Shape for a Project-Based Future 



A lot is changing at dentsu. We mentioned that its media division in the U.S. 
has had a leadership shakeup (scroll down to read up on that). But alsoMcCann 
Worldgroup is undergoing a transformation, with reported layoffs and executive 
exits.

Our executive editor Alison Weissbrot spoke with CEO Daryl Lee about his plan 
for the agency's future.



Read more 
<https://www.adweek.com/agencies/mccann-worldgroup-is-getting-in-shape-for-a-project-based-future/>



5. Amelia Dimoldenberg, Kordell Beckham, and More Lead Social Media Week Lineup



Stop me if you heard this one, but it bears repeating: Social Media Week 
cometh. Be sure to check out what we have in store.



Read more <https://www.adweek.com/?p=1880247> 



 The Round Up 



 * Warner Bros. Discovery CEO David Zaslav said sports is a 'rental business' 
and WBD is all in on IP (ADWEEK 
<https://www.adweek.com/convergent-tv/wbd-ceo-says-harry-potter-is-its-nfl/>).


 * Strong earnings from The Trade Desk show its disappointing previous quarter 
could have been the exception rather than the rule (ADWEEK 
<https://www.adweek.com/programmatic/the-trade-desk-25-year-over-year/>).


 * Comcast's spinoff company is called Versant. That's better than SpinCo, 
right? Right? (ADWEEK 
<https://www.adweek.com/brand-marketing/comcasts-spinoff-company-name-slippery-versant/>
).


 * MrBeast bought ads wishing himself a happy birthday (Futurism 
<https://futurism.com/mrbeast-birthday-ads>).


 * Meta is dipping into crypto again (Fortune 
<https://fortune.com/crypto/2025/05/08/meta-stablecoins-exploration-usdc-circle-diem-libra/>
).


 * Former British Vogue chief is launching a new print pub (The Hollywood 
Reporter 
<https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/business/business-news/edward-enninful-media-company-ee72-magazine-digital-platform-1236210151/>
).


 * The Guardian is planning a big U.S. expansion (Axios 
<https://www.axios.com/2025/05/06/the-guardian-us-expansion>).


 * xAI is thinking about raising fresh funding, at a $120B valuation (NYT 
<https://www.nytimes.com/2025/05/08/technology/xai-elon-musk-funding-value.html>
). 
 * It's time for advertisers to pivot to truly capture attention and drive 
performance in today’s video marketplace, (Brandshare from National CineMedia 
<https://www.adweek.com/sponsored/ctvs-got-millions-watching-but-no-one-is-paying-attention-to-your-ads/>
). 


Read more 
<https://www.adweek.com/convergent-tv/wbd-ceo-says-harry-potter-is-its-nfl/> 



 Revolving Door 



 * Dentsu Americas Media CEO Sean Reardon is leaving, and Will Swayne will 
expand his role to include the U.S. (ADWEEK 
<https://www.adweek.com/agencies/exclusive-denstu-americas-media-ceo-sean-reardon-is-leaving/>
).


 * OpenAI hires Instacart CEO Fidji Simo to head up its applications (ADWEEK 
<https://www.adweek.com/media/openai-hires-instacart-ceo-fidji-simo/>). 




 Get Ready for the Upfronts! 

 * Paramount's ads chief sees "no reason" to return to the annual boondoggle (
ADWEEK 
<https://www.adweek.com/convergent-tv/paramount-has-no-reason-to-go-back-to-upfront-week/>
).


 * But Paramount is hosting its Upfront dinners, and no surprise, execs feel 
things are positive (ADWEEK

).


 * WBD is also trying an updated approach to the Upfronts (ADWEEK 
<https://www.adweek.com/convergent-tv/wbd-ad-leaders-modernize-tv-upfront/>).


 * Telemundo is really pushing the FIFA World Cup (ADWEEK

batch.subject: May admin update
batch.content:
Slack
 
 





 


 

 
 



  


https://click.email.slackhq.com/?qs=c802a0ea970309245cb3d94e097e37769a44416b0d38ab47949b76008a58e7256bf217552bbdf1cec789aaecc18aaf2e418af551a9e9923b 


May • 2025
 

Slack Admin Updates
 

Read on to prepare yourselves and your members for new capabilities, changes and deprecations.
 

WHAT'S NEW
What’s new or currently rolling out:

  

Manage use of workflows with third-party connector steps in Slack Connect (Enterprise Grid)

Admins can allow or disallow the use of workflows with third-party connectors in Slack Connect via the use of global and per-connection policies. These controls allow admins to specify whether external members can use third-party connector workflows created by their organization, and whether members of their organization can use workflows created by external organizations.


  

Workflow access management update

When a workflow is added to a channel (featured or bookmarked), Slack will verify channel member inclusion in workflow permissions. If the channel is not included, users will receive a prompt to update permissions. This ensures consistent access for all channel participants.


  

Custom notification sound for VIPs

Members have the option to set custom sounds for designated VIPs.


https://click.email.slackhq.com/?qs=c802a0ea97030924b622274a4db0b12bd0e32a5fe9f6f0955787a28fe4a61c1644729747f75a06420666e4e31be9a7192150c22b2a42100459622faac376b1b9 
Learn more ‌ →

  

Channel ID in the channel management dashboard

A new column has been added to the channel management dashboard for Channel ID, as well as the ability to search the dashboard via Channel ID.


https://click.email.slackhq.com/?qs=c802a0ea97030924955f3c8473e38beb5c1521681f8dc90ba6eb36568074ee2f52a3853011a3026bfc0cdf7956982cc4750e9e668bd925fc86582b16e7922300 
Learn more ‌ →

  

New export filtering options

Admins can now generate exports that include only specific channel types and select particular channels for export. This results in smaller, more targeted data sets, reducing the time needed to locate relevant information.


https://click.email.slackhq.com/?qs=c802a0ea970309248c015946a8763fd6fd9407643b28c36eeb37524a7fdf1e93d76b4bc9cb5840d21cb1ceaa450e738895988dfec5628f4c3e34e4694c753e9e 
Learn more ‌ →

  


COMING SOON*
 

  

Co-ownership for canvases and lists

Canvas and list owners can share ownership permissions with other users, enabling them to reassign ownership when the original owner leaves the company.


  

Email subscription system for Slack status updates

Users will be able to subscribe to email updates via a new modal on the Slack system status page.


  

Workspace selection

There is a new workspace selection step in the group DM-to-private channel conversion flow.


  

VIP apps, bots, and workflows

Members will be able to designate apps, bots, and agents as VIPs.


  

Migrating channel canvases to standalone canvases

Channel canvases now act as standalone ones: shareable, deletable, and no longer tied to a specific channel.


  

Unified files browser

The canvas, files, and list views in the Slack navigation bar will be combined into a single view.


  

Removing section locks from canvas

More than one user will be able to edit a canvas section simultaneously.


  

Simplified layout mode

Simplified layout mode streamlines Slack for single-tasking and enhances compatibility with assistive technologies. Available only on desktop, it can be toggled on or off in Preferences > Accessibility. Designed to improve the experience for users with motor disabilities who rely on alternative inputs like eye-tracking devices, it also offers significant benefits for screen reader users and individuals who are highly sensitive to distractions.


  

Flag content updates (Enterprise Grid)

Admins will be able to see the edit history of flagged content. For messages, this will include all edits, including those made before and after the flag. For profile content like status, it will only include the flagged and current versions of the content.

Admins will now be able to see the managers of non-human entities when their content is flagged, including bots, agents & workflows. The flagged content dashboard will clearly indicate when flagged messages had been produced by a non-human entity.


  

Thread moderation capabilities (Enterprise Grid)

Admins who are able to moderate flagged content will be able to take two new moderation actions on message threads that they have permission to view. They will be able to pause reactions and replies on a message thread as well as hide the entire thread, including replies and reactions.


Upcoming deprecations

  

Files.upload API retirement has been extended until November 12, 2025

Slack has extended the deprecation window until November 12, 2025 to allow for more time to move to the new APIs. To prepare for this change, you will need to migrate away from files.upload and instead use the combination of 
https://api.slack.com/methods/files.getUploadURLExternal 
 files.getUploadURLExternal and 
https://api.slack.com/methods/files.completeUploadExternal 
 files.completeUploadExternal. More information on how to use these two APIs together can be found on our 
https://api.slack.com/messaging/files#uploading_files 
 Uploading files documentation.


https://click.email.slackhq.com/?qs=c802a0ea97030924e88d26ccfcbd138d5f77ff51047eb10f9c088d9b84d96d2d40509bf3467ec7713d8b76edba01d339ab899a3d15b977393f2d96835857774d 
Learn more ‌ →

Consolidation of installer packages on September 15, 2025

Slack will be consolidating the number of installer packages we support for Slack for Windows. The two MSI installers (MSI for per-user deployment and MSI for machine-wide installation) will be replaced with the MSIX format. After September 2025, there will be no new releases of our MSI packages and your IT team will need to uninstall the MSI package and distribute the MSIX package.


https://click.email.slackhq.com/?qs=c802a0ea97030924fa0a57ac1d0d85ace15a3f8f7a8cb88c788d46d9081a7c794a63def8fb5415346c7ba337d036cec7c3c86b35495446500220ee5e8e959f31 
Learn more ‌ →

OS, app, and browser versions reaching end of support on November 15, 2025

In accordance with our support lifecycle policy, we have discontinued support for a number of operating systems, app versions, and browsers.


https://click.email.slackhq.com/?qs=c802a0ea970309248bf27f06e26b64fe0c2bd957d6b89e5c4a4e712265b9be5045c77771debfd17d6f723b821831855f6d80bb977150c874983b6be021839d48 
Learn more ‌ →


 


https://click.email.slackhq.com/?qs=c802a0ea97030924c11d1f3d48b05e7187747011f73ab112f75876b2b813878d51050a6c0c73cd787c3bfd345164014e1fa09e8bc3c3537a49aec16d8b38c625 
Help Center 

*Purchase of Slack services is not dependent on the delivery of any future functionality, and such functionality is subject to change.
 


 

 


 
 
https://click.email.slackhq.com/?qs=c802a0ea97030924be8925926179af5287f3e2819c160f13c0fdfe7dab93504f7a6ee7c2e79ce9026a2062515c51561479a291c54259c29d

https://click.email.slackhq.com/?qs=c802a0ea970309240691c80a216432f9fd24dd7ee5a96e784cc5d280b6addff270b475c103bf640bc0efca7f2ccc685e6369cf8736fe9fe6

batch.subject: Supa Update April 2025
batch.content:
()

*****************************
Supabase Update — April 2025
*****************************

Hey matt@bluewatermarketing.com,

Here’s everything that happened with Supabase in the last month:

## Project scoped roles

[Project scoped roles](https://supabase.link/projectscopedroles-project-scoped-roles-apr2025-tg16) are now available for all Supabase Team plans. Each member in the organization can be assigned a role scoped to the organization or to specific projects.

[[GitHub](https://supabase.link/github-project-scoped-roles-apr2025-k2mz)]

## MCP Server now works with VS Code

Set up the Supabase MCP server to work with Visual Studio Code.

[[Twitter](https://supabase.link/twitter-mcp-server-vscode-setup-apr2025-0580)]

## MCP Server can now create and deploy Edge Functions

Use the Supabase MCP server to build Edge Functions.

[[Twitter](https://supabase.link/twitter-mcp-edge-functions-deploy-apr2025-az9v)]

## Supabase UI Library now includes Infinite Query block

React hook for infinite lists that fetches data from Supabase. Use it for infinite scroll.

[[Link](https://supabase.link/link-supabase-infinite-query-apr2025-23b2)] [[Twitter](https://supabase.link/twitter-supabase-infinite-query-apr2025-ruve)]

## Supabase UI Library now includes Social Auth

A block to quickly create authentication UI for [all supported social logins](https://supabase.link/allsupportedsociallogins-supabase-ui-social-auth-apr2025-6vae).

[[Link](https://supabase.link/link-supabase-ui-social-auth-apr2025-4fcs)] [[Twitter](https://supabase.link/twitter-supabase-ui-social-auth-apr2025-vmmi)]

## Quick Product Announcements

- The new Supabase SOC 2 report is available. [[Link](https://supabase.com/features/soc-2-compliance)]
- We published comprehensive documentation about our security processes and controls. [[Docs](https://supabase.link/docs-security-docs-overview-apr2025-5xpu)]

## Made with Supabase

- Web application for creating and editing AI-generated avatars using OpenAI’s DALL-E API. Built with React, TypeScript, and Supabase. [[GitHub](https://supabase.link/github-ai-avatar-creator-apr2025-96xb)]
- Data transformation systems engineered for your needs [[GitHub](https://supabase.link/github-data-transformation-systems-apr2025-tgv8)] [[Website](https://supabase.link/website-data-transformation-systems-apr2025-prei)]
- Command line for finding lines that have specific keywords in Rust . [[GitHub](https://supabase.link/github-rust-cli-keywords-apr2025-byhp)]

## Community Highlights

- Create a Reusable Team component for your application using Next.js, Supabase, and Shadcn [[Article](https://supabase.link/article-reusable-team-component-apr2025-dsxs)]
- Grocery Tracker App using Vue JS and Supabase [[Article](https://supabase.link/article-grocery-tracker-vue-apr2025-f8uy)]
- Use Supabase MCP in VSCode and Cursor [[Article](https://supabase.link/article-supabase-mcp-vscode-apr2025-u5vp)]
- Supabase WordPress Integration - SupaWP Plugin [[Article](https://supabase.link/article-supabase-wordpress-plugin-apr2025-njvx)]
- Implementing multi-tenancy into a Supabase app with Clerk [[Article](https://supabase.link/article-multi-tenancy-supabase-clerk-apr2025-4aza)]
- Build This Self-Expanding YouTube-Powered AI Agent Knowledge Base (n8n + Supabase) [[YouTube](https://supabase.link/youtube-self-expanding-ai-apr2025-zvzn)]
- Custom SMTP for Supabase Email Authentication | Complete Setup + Testing [[YouTube](https://supabase.link/youtube-custom-smtp-supabase-apr2025-od4h)]
- AI Chatbot That Remembers You! (n8n + Supabase + WhatsApp) [[YouTube](https://supabase.link/youtube-ai-chatbot-remembering-apr2025-t09w)]
- Building a MCP-Powered Task Manager Agent with Agno and Supabase: A Step-by-Step Guide [[Article](https://supabase.link/article-mcp-task-manager-apr2025-pc21)]
- How to Build an App From SCRATCH with Lovable + Supabase [[YouTube](https://supabase.link/youtube-build-app-scratch-apr2025-k9xh)]

batch.subject: Khakis, Big Bulges, & Hot People.
batch.content:
Hello my friend, welcome back to the Vibe Marketing Club. 

Where 23,000+ top advertisers and brands come to get ideas, improve their prompting skills, and become expert vibe marketers using AI in their ads. 

We’ve got some spiced-up ads for you this week that push the boundaries. But hey, that’s one of the best parts of advertising. 

The best part is, we made all three of them in less than 10 minutes. The inspo came from the[ most powerful AI ad tool](https://tryatria.com/) and extensive ad library. Check it out if you haven’t had the chance yet!

Anyway, on to this week’s best AI ads, breakdowns for each, and how you can apply the learnings to your brand!

———————————————————————————

## Ads of the Week

_The Perfect Jean, Ridge, Sunday Bedding_

———————————————————————————

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/2bf1cadf-7c25-471d-ad29-dfc29d6ee4f7/The_Perfect_Jean.jpg?t=1746438705)
Caption: 

### The Perfect Jean

**Analysis**: 

This ad for The Perfect Jean grabs attention instantly through the **shock effect **(_using surprising, provocative, or shocking content to grab attention and evoke a strong emotional response_) and **contrast bias** _(our perception of something is influenced by what we've just seen or experienced)_. “F#%K YOUR KHAKIS” attacks a competing product and is perfectly on brand for TPJ. It’s a pattern interruption that stops the scroll. The visual contrast between stiff khakis and the relaxed, flexible jeans reinforces the core benefit: stretch + comfort. The subhead uses benefit-stacking to quickly move from rebellion (“ditch the khakis”) to reward (“experience the stretch”). Because the ad isn’t about the pants, it’s about increasing your comfort and confidence.

**How you can apply it**: 

1. Use a bold, polarizing headline to instantly stop the scroll.

2. Call out the old way to make your product the hero of a “before/after” story.

3. Use **strong** visual contrast to reinforce your product’s key benefit.

4. Stack benefits in order of impact (pain relief → pleasure gain).

5. Speak like your audience talks, not like a brand trying to be polite.

**Prompt**: 

Create image for an ad campaign for The Perfect Jean titled: "F#%K YOUR KHAKIS"

Visual: A pair of stiff khakis folded next to a relaxed, stretched-out pair of The Perfect Jeans.

Headline: "F#%K YOUR KHAKIS"

Subtext: "Upgrade your comfort. Ditch the khakis. Experience the stretch of new denim."

Aspect Ratio: 1:1

———————————————————————————

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/e88cc108-6676-4936-8518-3eb27499cf71/Ridge.jpg?t=1746438788)
Caption: 

### Ridge

**Analysis**: 

**Social identity theory** _(derive a significant part of their self-concept and self-esteem from their membership in social groups)_ is a stronggggg motivator to get people to take action. The line “Not all bulges are a flex. Especially pocket ones.” grabs attention by walking the line between bold and cheeky, which instantly stands out by talking about people’s image, not the product. It uses a double entendre to create strong memorability, while also highlighting the key product benefit: slim, sleek, no-pocket-bulk bs. 

**How you can apply it**: 

1. Use humor, a joke, or a bold line that ties back to your product’s benefit.

2. Lean into shared pain points (like bulky wallets) to make your offer relatable.

3. Show your product solving the problem in a visual, literal way.

4. Keep the copy short, punchy, and scroll-stopping, then drop the benefit immediately after.

5. Make your tone match your audience. 

**Prompt**: Create an image for an ad campaign for Ridge. The image should be an ultra-realistic male with a grey shirt and blue jeans with a brown belt and should feature the lower half of his body. He should be holding out the ridge wallet attached in his right hand. In his left front jean pocket, there should be a big wallet that sticks out like a sore thumb. Headline at the bottom of the ad should read “Not all bulges are a flex. Especially pocket ones.” Font: League Spartan - Aspect ratio 1:1

———————————————————————————

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/67038af2-3ad2-4381-bb79-bd248be7cff4/Sunday_Bedding.jpg?t=1746438809)
Caption: 

### Sunday Bedding

**Analysis**: 

We love ourselves. Vanity appeals and clever doubles work wonders in this game. “HOT PEOPLE SLEEP HERE” works on two levels: it flatters the viewer (you’re attractive) while also hinting at the literal problem (sleeping hot). The subhead, “Sheets designed to cool you in the heat,” delivers the _actual_ benefit clearly, giving emotional and practical payoff. The visual is warm, intimate, and aspirational which activates mirror neurons that make you imagine yourself in that cozy scene.

**How you can apply it**: 

1. Use wordplay to stack meanings & combine humor and a benefit in one punchy headline.

2. Appeal to vanity, but back it with value. Flattery opens the door, benefits close the door.

3. Design with lifestyle in mind. Make your audience feel in the moment.

4. Headlines should grab attention, subhead clarifies the message.

5. Use visuals that match the promise. Congruency is king. 

**Prompt**: Create image for an ad campaign for Sunday Bedding titled 'Hot People Sleep Here.' The ad should include an ultra realistic Bed with rumpled Sunday sheets + a couple male and female sleeping soundly in the sheets with an arial bedroom view. the lighting should be dim and cinematic so you can see the room. Subhead: Sheets designed to cool you in the heat. 

———————————————————————————

Annnnnd that’s a wrap for this week. As always, thanks for vibin’ with me this week. 

Hope you got some value from this week’s edition and are able to apply it to your brand and print money. If you want to see your brand featured (or any brand), just reply to this email with the name! 

Til next week, stay chill and keep the good vibes rollin’.

———————————————————————————

Oh and if you want to ship winning ads 10x faster, get AI recommendations, and premade one-click analytics reports, bounce over [here](https://tryatria.com/)! 

P.S. When you decide to [book a demo](https://calendly.com/ray-atria) with our team, let them know if this newsletter was the reason you booked. It’ll help me keep my job and have super secret vibe sessions while drinking my morning coffee. 


———

https://news.vibemarketing.club/p/khakis-big-bulges-hot-people-f8485acb3c7ab5d8

batch.subject: Eastern Europe’s Social Media Experts: Your Key to Staying Ahead
batch.content:
Not interested in hearing from Lean Leverage or Go Carpathian?
 Unsubscribe at the bottom of this email. 

———————————————————————————

Digital Savviness of Eastern Europeans presents [a social media manager hire opportunity](https://gocarpathian.com/hire-social-media-manager/) for you that you may be missing!

Eastern Europe has quietly become a powerhouse region for exceptional social media talent, creating a perfect opportunity for forward-thinking agencies to gain a competitive edge.

Here’s why this region consistently produces standout social media talent:

## **High Social Media Presence**

Eastern Europe is one of the most connected regions in the world. According to [DataReportal’s 2024 Global Digital Report](https://datareportal.com/reports/):

* Romania: 89.4% of the population uses social media

* Serbia: 84.7%

* Bulgaria: 82.1%

* Poland: 79.3%

By comparison, the U.S. sits at 72.5%.

And it’s not just about access, it’s about usage. In Eastern Europe, the average time spent on social media is between 2.5 to 3 hours per day. In the U.S., that number is closer to [2 hours and 14 minutes](https://datareportal.com/reports/digital-2023-global-overview-report).

That means the average Eastern European user is spending 15–45 more minutes per day on platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube, engaging with trends, content formats, and platform features in real time.

_They’re creators, not just consumers._

## **Western Cultural Fluency**

Eastern Europeans grow up immersed in Western media. Netflix, YouTube, Spotify, Reddit, and Instagram are part of daily life. English-language content dominates entertainment and education, which means:

* They understand Western humor, tone, and references

* They can write captions and scripts that feel native, not translated

* They’re tuned into the same trends your audience is already following

This cultural alignment is a huge advantage when it comes to brand voice, meme fluency, and platform-native content.

———————————————————————————

####  📬 SUPERCHARGE YOUR SEO WITH PREMIUM BACKLINKS!

Tired of low-quality links that hurt more than help? Our proven, white hat link-building service delivers:

✅ Nearly 10 years of expertise trusted by agencies & tech companies.

✅ 100% manual outreach for high-quality, relevant links (DA 30+).

✅ Custom packages tailored to your niche & goals.

✅ Scalable pricing: $200/link (1–50/month) or $175/link (50+/month).

👉 Ready to boost your rankings? [Book a free consultation ](https://calendar.app.google/8SxEkKQXX19Dg5zU8) 

———————————————————————————

## **Strong English Proficiency**

English is taught early and often across the region. Many of the candidates we place speak and write with near-native fluency. They’re comfortable managing English-language accounts, engaging with global audiences, and collaborating with international teams.

Here’s a handy graph for English proficiency in Eastern European countries:

View image: (https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXc7NZLh6iAf3Aanf_82jU4cPcL9g-i41Qe7mipqOGoArTkPOk2m0dWukaaIgQsXV1s5yd88p50oUN5htf7IPoYUNqtK2AKJf7meoliEGPZ0lFrIvAwDpIe_7tm_rzzLi8vxnW9L?key=U2BWAX0DUi_RZPjrBU8CfQ)
Caption: 

## **Infrastructure That Supports Remote Work**

Eastern Europe has some of the fastest internet speeds in the world. According to [Speedtest Global Index](https://www.speedtest.net/global-index):

* Romania ranks #6 globally for fixed broadband speed

* Bulgaria: #11

* Hungary: #13

* Poland: #18

The U.S., by comparison, ranks #19.

This matters. Fast, reliable internet means smoother collaboration, faster content uploads, and fewer delays in campaign execution, especially when working with video, design files, or real-time platform management.

## **Digital-Native Work Ethic**

Social media isn’t a side hustle here, it’s a serious career path. You’ll find candidates who’ve:

* Built and managed brand accounts

* Run paid campaigns

* Created short-form video content

* Grown niche communities

* Reported on performance metrics

They’re not just posting, they’re thinking about engagement, reach, and growth.

## **Infrastructure That Supports Remote Work**

Eastern Europe has fast internet, modern workspaces, and a strong remote work culture. Most candidates are already set up to work with international clients. They’re used to async communication, project management tools, and delivering on deadlines without needing constant check-ins.

## **What You Can Expect**

We’ve placed Eastern European talent in roles like:

* Social Media Manager

* Content Strategist

* Community Manager

* Video Editor

* Paid Social Specialist

## **Our Rigorous Vetting Process**

We find candidates for you and we make absolutely sure they're the right fit. Here's how we vet every social media manager:

* Multiple rounds of role-playing exercises to test their content creation and engagement skills in real-time

* Thorough reference checks with past employers and clients

* Detailed portfolio reviews focusing on engagement metrics and growth results

* Live English proficiency assessments (both written and verbal)

* Platform-specific knowledge tests for Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, and other key networks

* Cultural fit interviews to ensure they'll mesh with your team and understand your audience

This intensive screening process means you only see candidates who can hit the ground running from day one.

**We can show you the first candidates in 2 days (50% of clients hire someone we introduce them to within 2 days of onboarding.**

Let’s talk!

[Free Discovery Call with Recruiting Specialist](https://app.apollo.io/#/meet/tis-mkn-je6/30-min)

Until next time,


Nathan

———————————————————————————

Monthly Glow Up

 

 
How Erin transforms ideas into organized plans

 

[https://braze-images.com/appboy/communication/assets/image_assets/images/67cf7fcc2ad9fc0065fe200a/original.gif?1741651915]https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.CfOoif63IrzNhQPL6_V0ehW5ipa2eOexan7znVMeXS5ha4cMjXVcC6MIb-hazzZV/4gb/k-qhSDGCRIqywM999jbh_A/h2/h001._RWBomr_hCMNgs--qzcz2y6ccMK2Dkkim80-xADxKR4

 
This month, let Erin show you how to go from vision to execution in less than 5
minutes. Check out our Top 4 AI Hacks
[https://l.engage.canva.com/ss/c/u001.Note3it1gaozj0PIggVG9htgmxXo2GY2NJNEM-BT12sgcELBMR4yuNXXcoKYC87NdbbwPALfCyWouREM_tSPnA/4gb/k-qhSDGCRIqywM999jbh_A/h3/h001.cwWkXVxiGMQOwvqRvBIRA1XMXccGID4jlkSSs6VvyaE]
and watch how she transforms notes from a brainstorming session into an
organized action plan with just a few clicks.

[http://braze-images.com/spacer.gif]

batch.content:
Hi Matt, check out these resources for successful PPC management 👇

dynamic gen specs (https://cart.com/e3t/Ctc/ZW+113/d2LcY604/VWwFHH3H9z_NW3Hzh_m88FNmSW69sl4k5wjTJ1N9k7M9W3l5QzW7lCdLW6lZ3l3W6hHf9k1J-S5vW9g8Gh01LhGRZW5zllsX20V9fkVn4P4n1K0RS_W3LpSh21WpDY6W7cQn5h55Rh6ZW4tpb_g331-XgW6694vh5nytw5W2KmJf36lK0W_W9f_Knw7N2SXSW86pRdm1RDTyfN8YVq1qLCdClW3VpCh481Q-F2W2fW7Fr14YG-GW1dMRgr39P8n_W6tvGZJ2LDQ7vN8s8sfXjQlDDW63jXkG5BqnLSN81ynH4NLK8XVllc6Z7vJF3bW4dP1zB20PH5hW8qPfyt8Vqc66W5hy3s45wrJ7GV2NSZv2xYCtHdBFH3T04 )

Demand Gen Specs Explained

Google Demand Gen campaigns are shaking things up with some new features. One of the most exciting updates? Product data feed integration. It’s a game-changer for boosting engagement and conversions. Here’s your go-to guide for mastering demand gen specs and best practices, so you can set up campaigns that crush it across all Google channels.

Keep reading >> (https://cart.com/e3t/Ctc/ZW+113/d2LcY604/VWwFHH3H9z_NW3Hzh_m88FNmSW69sl4k5wjTJ1N9k7M9W3l5QzW7lCdLW6lZ3l3W6hHf9k1J-S5vW9g8Gh01LhGRZW5zllsX20V9fkVn4P4n1K0RS_W3LpSh21WpDY6W7cQn5h55Rh6ZW4tpb_g331-XgW6694vh5nytw5W2KmJf36lK0W_W9f_Knw7N2SXSW86pRdm1RDTyfN8YVq1qLCdClW3VpCh481Q-F2W2fW7Fr14YG-GW1dMRgr39P8n_W6tvGZJ2LDQ7vN8s8sfXjQlDDW63jXkG5BqnLSN81ynH4NLK8XVllc6Z7vJF3bW4dP1zB20PH5hW8qPfyt8Vqc66W5hy3s45wrJ7GV2NSZv2xYCtHdBFH3T04 )

demand gen vs pmax (https://cart.com/e3t/Ctc/ZW+113/d2LcY604/VWwFHH3H9z_NW3Hzh_m88FNmSW69sl4k5wjTJ1N9k7M9C3l5QzW6N1vHY6lZ3n_W35WkyW3MTVHGN2BbDwRFS99qW8tyd7D2HZ3DQN7gQgJGByjzMW5Vz-Mw740p_8W2pQ1Dv2xXHG7W8YXWFJ7kzc9hW12RngY4T7-ZTW6qrxKM3t0wkTW4mQ9Yt69RydgW5pzcZt7-9YY3W8X-8sB3c5-_-W8Wk2fj7VD014N1cQ13fdjvd3W3kLCjx6hv-M_W8MWtZB9ghLJGW5k8r7P6-6HJqW1Bwzcs7pPnMsW2DTwJ78TwMFFW1zR7Km7yc4m6W8dZJsG8XddrxW97wvj98jB_SDf3s7mhF04 )

Demand Gen vs. PMax

Mastering Demand Gen and PMax campaigns comes down to understanding how they work and what makes them different. Once you get the hang of each one, you can use them together in your marketing strategy to cover the entire customer journey.

Keep reading >> (https://cart.com/e3t/Ctc/ZW+113/d2LcY604/VWwFHH3H9z_NW3Hzh_m88FNmSW69sl4k5wjTJ1N9k7M9C3l5QzW6N1vHY6lZ3n_W35WkyW3MTVHGN2BbDwRFS99qW8tyd7D2HZ3DQN7gQgJGByjzMW5Vz-Mw740p_8W2pQ1Dv2xXHG7W8YXWFJ7kzc9hW12RngY4T7-ZTW6qrxKM3t0wkTW4mQ9Yt69RydgW5pzcZt7-9YY3W8X-8sB3c5-_-W8Wk2fj7VD014N1cQ13fdjvd3W3kLCjx6hv-M_W8MWtZB9ghLJGW5k8r7P6-6HJqW1Bwzcs7pPnMsW2DTwJ78TwMFFW1zR7Km7yc4m6W8dZJsG8XddrxW97wvj98jB_SDf3s7mhF04 )

demand gen (https://cart.com/e3t/Ctc/ZW+113/d2LcY604/VWwFHH3H9z_NW3Hzh_m88FNmSW69sl4k5wjTJ1N9k7M9C3l5QzW6N1vHY6lZ3nCW6nQHT_6mFW1wW2wX-t_5hxhpXW4_lwc-3DZbCHW91Y5TL6zK483W4hx7XJ9gtph7W7NJmGK2cBRcQN684lCrDy821N75w9S395TFhW7t_qm152jgfjW2t_v8C1TG0VpW2SMRj16bxDw5W4NS2C-6dB2qFW5jbSQy5RSBCcN4fQ-rQ6bwrrN8fzJtC7kJSGW2l469j4ypMbvW55ptgx17Wd6HW5m18h78DKy0PVScz093tLB2cW16qFm21TRjd3VmjC9Y5lJ_HJN1pBSqbZjHkcf5YCspY04 )

What sets Demand Gen Campaigns Apart?

Google's new Demand Gen campaigns are a big deal. They show exactly where Google Ads is headed: doubling down on first-party data and leaning heavily into artificial intelligence. Learn what makes these campaigns different from others, along with tips for running them.

Keep reading >> (https://cart.com/e3t/Ctc/ZW+113/d2LcY604/VWwFHH3H9z_NW3Hzh_m88FNmSW69sl4k5wjTJ1N9k7M9C3l5QzW6N1vHY6lZ3nCW6nQHT_6mFW1wW2wX-t_5hxhpXW4_lwc-3DZbCHW91Y5TL6zK483W4hx7XJ9gtph7W7NJmGK2cBRcQN684lCrDy821N75w9S395TFhW7t_qm152jgfjW2t_v8C1TG0VpW2SMRj16bxDw5W4NS2C-6dB2qFW5jbSQy5RSBCcN4fQ-rQ6bwrrN8fzJtC7kJSGW2l469j4ypMbvW55ptgx17Wd6HW5m18h78DKy0PVScz093tLB2cW16qFm21TRjd3VmjC9Y5lJ_HJN1pBSqbZjHkcf5YCspY04 )

PPC Highlight of the week

AI Max for Search campaigns are coming soon from Google Ads. Google calls it a  "comprehensive suite of targeting and creative enhancements".

batch.subject: 🤝 Free marketing for you. Case study with Atria 🤝
batch.content:
Hi Matt,

How are you doing?

Heads up, we'd love to turn your Atria experience into a short case study that highlights how your team is winning with AI‑powered ad optimization.

Most importantly, we want you in the spotlight.

*Why it’s worth your time
*
*•  Extra Visibility.* Atria drives thousands of targeted marketers to our site every month. Your company will be front‑and‑center on a high‑traffic page.
*•  Credibility Boost.* A third‑party success story instantly sharpens your social proof for prospects, partners, and future recruits.
*•  Marketing Fuel - done for you.* We’ll draft the narrative, design the visuals, and loop you in for quick edits. You get a polished asset to repost across your own channels.

*What we need
*
•  A 30‑minute short call / interview
•  Permission to use key metrics or quotes you’re comfortable sharing
•  A rapid thumbs‑up on the final draft (we’ll keep it tight and accurate)

That’s it. We handle the heavy lifting; you reap the visibility.

Could we lock in a quick call next week to kick things off?
Just reply with a day/time (in Eastern Standard Time / New York Time) that works, and I’ll get it on the calendar.

Thanks for being a flagship partner.

We’re excited to spotlight the great work your team is doing.

Best,
Ray Jang
Founder & CEO, Atria

Global Moments & Local Connections: Get Involved in What's Next at Manus

  


  

Hey there,

Manus Meetups have hit 8+ cities across 5 countries throughout the US, Tokyo, 
Singapore, Dubai, Riyadh, Melbourne, and Sydney. The energy is electric, and 
your feedback is directly shaping what we build next.

  




Meetup Highlights


Our community is crushing it. Professionals and hobbyists alike are pushing 
the bounderies of what's possible with Manus. A Dubai consultant turned a $5 
Manus task into thousands in value. A Sydney first-time car buyer picked the 
perfect vehicle for his needs and budget based on detailed reccomendations from 
Manus. A Melbourne investment banker used Manus to save half a day's work for 
her team of junior analysts. Across the globe, people are generating complex 
reports and launching creative projects without breaking a sweat.


The energy here in the US has been remarkable, from engaging discussions at 
UCLA to dynamic connections made during our Agent Builder Happy Hour in San 
Francisco. We've witnessed an inspiring mix of students exploring AI's 
potential, professionals integrating Manus into their workflows, and innovators 
pushing boundaries. The collaborative spirit within the US community continues 
to grow, and we're particularly excited about Manus Fellow-led initiatives like 
our recent Vibe Coding For Startups gathering in New York.


View the full recap and photos from Atherton 
<https://events.manus.im/events/manus-meetup-atherton> / San Francisco 
<https://events.manus.im/events/manus-meetup-sf> / Provo 
<https://events.manus.im/events/manus-meetup-provo>  / New York 
<https://events.manus.im/events/manus-ai-fireside-chat>  / UCLA 
<https://events.manus.im/events/manus-meetup-ucla>

  










What's Next


What's even better? Manus fans are now organizing their own Manus events to 
connect, problem-solve, and help us build a better product together.

Looking ahead, we're committed to empowering this community spirit through our 
Manus Fellow Program. Fellows are the backbone of local communities, and soon 
you'll see more fellow-led meetups popping up in cities worldwide. Power users 
who love sharing knowledge and bringing people together, this is your moment. 
As a Manus Fellow, you'll direct access to our team and resources to make an 
impact in your local community.

  


  

Apply now <https://manus.im/fellows> 
  

We're also backing the next generation with Manus for Campus, giving students 
at partner universities exclusive access to help them excel in their studies 
and complete innovative projects. Know a student who could level up with Manus? 
Send them our way.

  


  

View more <https://manus.im/edu> 
  

Your continued membership makes all this possible. Let's keep accomplishing 
great things together.


Thank you,

The Manus Team

 <https://www.instagram.com/manusaiofficial/> 

 <https://www.youtube.com/@Manus-AI>

batch.subject: List from Mike
batch.content:
Alternate text


 (https://t.e2ma.net/click/m6z5f4f/2q2dxmv/qhfs52yb)


Good Morning,

My list this week highlights vetted Professional and Skilled Trades candidates.

I want to help you find you the right people for your organization.

If you don't see who you need, just Mike.England@ExpressPros.com (mailto:Mike.England@ExpressPros.com?subject=I%20need%20help%20finding...) me the details of your open position so that my Team can use our state of the art recruiting tools and resources to find you the right person.

Thank you. I look forward to hearing from you.

                                                              ~ Mike England, Owner Treasure Coast Region

                                                                   of Express Employment Professionals



Paralegal

Shante is an experienced and highly versatile legal professional with nearly a decade of paralegal experience supporting attorneys in guardianship, public interest, personal injury, and litigation matters. She has drafted and filed pleadings, conducted client intakes, managed legal calendars, and prepared cases for hearings and mediations across both private law firms and nonprofit legal services. Shante's strong foundation in legal research, billing, and document preparation is paired with her ability to communicate effectively with clients, counsel, and court personnel. Her background in both law school and hands-on legal roles allows her to bring precision, professionalism, and empathy to complex legal environments.

[if mso]> (mailto:Jennifer.Painter@ExpressPros.com?subject=Shante%20-%20Paralegal)

Digital Marketing / Social Media Specialist

Sharon is a results-driven U.S. Military Veteran with expertise in digital marketing, social media management, and sales leadership. Skilled in paid advertisement campaigns (Google, Facebook, Instagram), SEO optimization, and web development, with proficiency in Google Analytics, Ads Manager, and CRM tools.

[if mso]> (mailto:Rachael.Oliver@ExpressPros.com?subject=Sharon%20-%20Digital%20Marketing%20%2F%20Social%20Media%20Specialist)

Paralegal / Legal Assistant

Cindy is a dedicated Legal Assistant with extensive experience in probate, corporate, tax, estate planning, and personal injury law, supporting attorneys and clients across multiple legal areas. She is highly skilled in client communication, appointment scheduling, legal documentation, and handling sensitive tax matters, including filing extensions and communicating directly with the IRS. Cindy brings strong technical proficiency with ProSeries, Microsoft Office, and legal software such as Prevail, while maintaining a professional, client-focused front desk presence. Her multitasking ability, organizational skills, and compassionate approach make her a strong asset in any legal or administrative setting.

[if mso]> (mailto:Jennifer.Painter@ExpressPros.com?subject=Cindy%20-%20Paralegal%20%2F%20Legal%20Assistant)

Office Manager / Bookkeeper

Tracey is a versatile professional with over a decade of experience in real estate, office management, and accounting, with a strong background in property management and transaction coordination. She is highly skilled in QuickBooks, payroll, accounts payable/receivable, and lease preparation for both residential and commercial properties. Her leadership in office settings, from managing maintenance teams to training staff and handling legal documentation, showcases her ability to drive efficiency across operations. As a certified notary, licensed real estate professional, and experienced bookkeeper, Tracey brings a well-rounded, client-focused approach to any administrative or property management role.

[if mso]> (mailto:Jennifer.Painter@ExpressPros.com?subject=Tracey%20-%20Office%20Manager%20%2F%20Bookkeeper)

Paralegal / Legal Assistant

Precious  is a skilled Legal Assistant with a strong foundation in paralegal studies and over a decade of experience supporting attorneys in traffic, litigation, and administrative law. At The Ticket Clinic, she managed case files, scheduled legal proceedings, drafted court documents, and ensured accurate communication between clients and legal teams. She also brings extensive customer service and data entry experience from roles in healthcare and remote clerical support, with proven strengths in multitasking, confidentiality, and legal software. With a Paralegal Certificate, notary credentials, and proficiency in Westlaw, Lexis-Nexis, and Microsoft Office, Precious is a detail-oriented and dependable asset to any legal or administrative team.

[if mso]> (mailto:Jennifer.Painter@ExpressPros.com?subject=Precious%20-%20Paralegal%20%2F%20Legal%20Assistant)

Sales Manager

Mark is a seasoned sales and customer service professional with over 30 years of experience delivering results across diverse industries. Known for his strong relationship-building skills, Mark consistently drives revenue growth while maintaining a customer-first approach.

[if mso]> (mailto:Rachael.Oliver@ExpressPros.com?subject=Mark%20-%20Sales%20Manager)

Paralegal

Blair  is a seasoned paralegal with over a decade of experience supporting litigation, scheduling, and legal document preparation across multiple law firms in Florida and California. She has managed court filings, coordinated hearings and mediations, prepared motions and subpoenas, and maintained case calendars for attorneys. Blair is highly proficient in legal software and e-filing systems and is known for her organizational skills and professionalism in high-volume legal environments. She is also a Florida notary and certified loan signing agent, bringing added value to legal teams.

[if mso]> (mailto:Jennifer.Painter@ExpressPros.com?subject=Blair%20-%20Paralegal)



Welder

Michael is a versatile and highly skilled professional with over 12 years of experience in welding, fabrication, mechanical repair, and structural steel work, along with a strong background in building maintenance and equipment troubleshooting. Known for his precision, reliability, and commitment to safety, Michael has supported operations across industrial, construction, and manufacturing environments. He is AWS/ASME certified in 6G pipe welding and brings hands-on experience with MIG & Stick techniques, making him an asset for any team requiring skilled trades expertise and dependable support.

[if mso]> (mailto:Rachael.Oliver@ExpressPros.com?subject=Michael%20-%20Welder)

Foreman

Brett  is a versatile and driven business professional with over a decade of experience spanning customer service, sales, heavy equipment operation, and project management within the drilling and construction industries. Known for his leadership, problem-solving skills, and commitment to safety, Brett has successfully led field teams, managed client relationships, and ensured project efficiency and compliance.

[if mso]> (mailto:Rachael.Oliver@ExpressPros.com?subject=Brett%20-%20Foreman)

performance incentives in real time, and create seamless, scalable workflows.

Rocket Mortgage's $824m Marketing Strategy ANALYSED
batch.content:
AVOID THEIR BIG SEO MISTAKE

Video thumbnail featuring the Rocket Mortgage logo, a cracked phone screen, and caption reading "a surprisingly flawed marketing machine. Watch the video (https://email.exposureninja.com/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJx7f04/VW3q0Q49xbT2W8d-hmw6psyN9W87_Sgk5wg-pBN8DGmD43l5QzW6N1vHY6lZ3n0W3rzC0K8L0PgMW6g0wJq4H9hTmW64-Vp950YfBCW3MX9NV7CyhY-W4kfYfy1vLQ40W7BtfZF749VsyN7Dqhqfj4T7GW7vRc0k6F1rpGW5DFVbx444wCFW1gWgLS3BLf1GW2ZRpHV1hkK1FW55C3tV6zDhvJVmNHqq30dSYgW27zKXn8XNtrBW8yFPd_7225bHW6R01cZ7-yFszW3QTKpM6Khn7bW3SQYJn3HWDkYW4BR3pJ2QXJfsW3ls6JJ7hbs9lVB0twy3M2DRMW7gcmGH3y4N6Wf5vMjcT04 ) or listen to the podcast (https://email.exposureninja.com/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJx7f04/VW3q0Q49xbT2W8d-hmw6psyN9W87_Sgk5wg-pBN8DGmD43l5QzW6N1vHY6lZ3n7W22HVY7760RWWW5HzMGL1b1Qk7W78c3x48VTMRgW3Cfz3F72-TWNTmKRP5p0CnJW78Yc245v0zh2W56nSdK6RD2vmW7gV8nK4dDhzXW30hnbg20Z5CsW4-TYk16yjp17W6VyM2t7YN8DYW13KNWj4KMhlLW5FDrxT8DyVtDW3W0_tK3BW-5nW3pNN0S3dKwHlVNZZyS7JJLj2W7ZXpxg58mzq5N7L14FZLGfv8W1hcL4b5XgBqyW80lzMc46sHx8W4NgDRN4Kv_k_W3qM4F48TMb4cf7L490d04 ) instead

Hey Matt,

While marketers everywhere are scrambling to keep up with AI and new marketing channels, a traditional approach continues driving extraordinary results for one of America's largest mortgage providers — although with a surprising flaw that's costing them millions.

Rocket Mortgage (https://email.exposureninja.com/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJx7f04/VW3q0Q49xbT2W8d-hmw6psyN9W87_Sgk5wg-pBN8DGmD43l5QzW6N1vHY6lZ3n0W3rzC0K8L0PgMW6g0wJq4H9hTmW64-Vp950YfBCW3MX9NV7CyhY-W4kfYfy1vLQ40W7BtfZF749VsyN7Dqhqfj4T7GW7vRc0k6F1rpGW5DFVbx444wCFW1gWgLS3BLf1GW2ZRpHV1hkK1FW55C3tV6zDhvJVmNHqq30dSYgW27zKXn8XNtrBW8yFPd_7225bHW6R01cZ7-yFszW3QTKpM6Khn7bW3SQYJn3HWDkYW4BR3pJ2QXJfsW3ls6JJ7hbs9lVB0twy3M2DRMW7gcmGH3y4N6Wf5vMjcT04 ) generated $5.1B in revenue last year, up 34% from the previous year.

But here's what makes this truly fascinating:

- They're spending $824M annually on marketing (16% of revenue)

- Their content strategy drives 1.4 million monthly organic visits

- Yet they're nowhere to be found for critical commercial keywords

In other words, the company responsible for one in six US mortgages is growing rapidly despite a fundamental flaw in their digital strategy that's forcing them to spend millions unnecessarily.

The Million-Dollar Question

Marketing teams in competitive industries are all trying to solve the same challenge:

"How do we balance content marketing with commercial keyword targeting to maximise growth?"

After implementing successful strategies for multiple clients in financial services (including an up-and-coming mortgage lender competitor to Rocket), we've identified exactly what Rocket is doing right (https://email.exposureninja.com/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJx7f04/VW3q0Q49xbT2W8d-hmw6psyN9W87_Sgk5wg-pBN8DGmD43l5QzW6N1vHY6lZ3n0W3rzC0K8L0PgMW6g0wJq4H9hTmW64-Vp950YfBCW3MX9NV7CyhY-W4kfYfy1vLQ40W7BtfZF749VsyN7Dqhqfj4T7GW7vRc0k6F1rpGW5DFVbx444wCFW1gWgLS3BLf1GW2ZRpHV1hkK1FW55C3tV6zDhvJVmNHqq30dSYgW27zKXn8XNtrBW8yFPd_7225bHW6R01cZ7-yFszW3QTKpM6Khn7bW3SQYJn3HWDkYW4BR3pJ2QXJfsW3ls6JJ7hbs9lVB0twy3M2DRMW7gcmGH3y4N6Wf5vMjcT04 ) — and where they're leaving money on the table.

Screenshot of the Rocket Mortgage homepage. (https://email.exposureninja.com/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJx7f04/VW3q0Q49xbT2W8d-hmw6psyN9W87_Sgk5wg-pBN8DGmCP3l5QzW69sMD-6lZ3kNW5_RK0C7nMK8MW77pSsj2hlzXVW4_stxp4SPS_kW63h_cY4j7hVyW23DC3W8-_NxfW9jFC5v78BFWbV2RtKs4BgSscW3jSSf_79740VW3yWnsk7PY2G3W18D4ZZ3NQy3DVGsgfM8qjG-6W2qC90l3NG7r6W3F8L4S6JtqSxVGnY652fbXnKW5n9cmT6tcMVRW4kdZD01jkp1qW8JdQ9812WyK6W4tn22M1wCJHTW9bT-HQ7MBJbrW6H-4Mf3thtSPf7BgZmY04 )

Three Key Insights from Rocket's $5 Billion Strategy

We've distilled our analysis into three essential components:

1. Crystal-Clear Value Propositions Convert

Rocket's website is a masterclass in conversion-focused messaging.

Instead of generic CTAs like "Get a Mortgage," they use specific, benefit-driven language like "I'm buying a home — save up to $10,000."

This specificity demonstrates a deep understanding of customer motivations and creates significantly higher conversion rates than their competitors.

Our analysis shows that specific value propositions increase conversion rates by up to 45% compared to generic alternatives.

Screenshot of Rocket Mortgage's offering call-to-action. (https://email.exposureninja.com/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJx7f04/VW3q0Q49xbT2W8d-hmw6psyN9W87_Sgk5wg-pBN8DGmCP3l5QzW69sMD-6lZ3kNW5_RK0C7nMK8MW77pSsj2hlzXVW4_stxp4SPS_kW63h_cY4j7hVyW23DC3W8-_NxfW9jFC5v78BFWbV2RtKs4BgSscW3jSSf_79740VW3yWnsk7PY2G3W18D4ZZ3NQy3DVGsgfM8qjG-6W2qC90l3NG7r6W3F8L4S6JtqSxVGnY652fbXnKW5n9cmT6tcMVRW4kdZD01jkp1qW8JdQ9812WyK6W4tn22M1wCJHTW9bT-HQ7MBJbrW6H-4Mf3thtSPf7BgZmY04 )

2. Content Marketing Drives Authority

Rocket's "Learn" section is a comprehensive resource hub covering everything from mortgage types to real estate market conditions.

Their educational content generates 1.4 million monthly visits — 60% of their total organic traffic — positioning them as a trusted advisor before prospects are ready to apply.

However, there's a critical oversight in their content strategy: they're failing to target commercial keywords with the same thoroughness.

This means that when users move from research to purchase, Rocket disappears from their search results (https://email.exposureninja.com/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJx7f04/VW3q0Q49xbT2W8d-hmw6psyN9W87_Sgk5wg-pBN8DGmD43l5QzW6N1vHY6lZ3n0W3rzC0K8L0PgMW6g0wJq4H9hTmW64-Vp950YfBCW3MX9NV7CyhY-W4kfYfy1vLQ40W7BtfZF749VsyN7Dqhqfj4T7GW7vRc0k6F1rpGW5DFVbx444wCFW1gWgLS3BLf1GW2ZRpHV1hkK1FW55C3tV6zDhvJVmNHqq30dSYgW27zKXn8XNtrBW8yFPd_7225bHW6R01cZ7-yFszW3QTKpM6Khn7bW3SQYJn3HWDkYW4BR3pJ2QXJfsW3ls6JJ7hbs9lVB0twy3M2DRMW7gcmGH3y4N6Wf5vMjcT04 ) .

Semrush dashboard showing organic traffic stats for rocketmortgage.com/learn with 1.4M visits and $4.8M traffic cost. (https://email.exposureninja.com/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJx7f04/VW3q0Q49xbT2W8d-hmw6psyN9W87_Sgk5wg-pBN8DGmCP3l5QzW69sMD-6lZ3pfW6wt8L_4nJfmyW3xfxS27c79VSW77K3Pw5fXF-QVXq5gK88X8BcN2S2zD9YV1cDW4vhGgK4_Gk6dW1LFpnq5cz_zKW7dW4Rk6w35qHW6ZsYyg98nq11W3c3cNt3n-bmpN4-ryqvXLmvFN1d8V9B1L-j-W2NRmxq7cyVwbW1t2G8v9fFFy3W4lbjq34wjKZjW39tvpT1WLvbzW1DhF_545GqZ-W5W34Q12Sg6J1W1SH7x88r06qGW8s_mjs98YcHcf2Y2tKM04 )

Screenshot from Semrush - Try Semrush for Free* (https://email.exposureninja.com/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJx7f04/VW3q0Q49xbT2W8d-hmw6psyN9W87_Sgk5wg-pBN8DGmCP3l5QzW69sMD-6lZ3pfW6wt8L_4nJfmyW3xfxS27c79VSW77K3Pw5fXF-QVXq5gK88X8BcN2S2zD9YV1cDW4vhGgK4_Gk6dW1LFpnq5cz_zKW7dW4Rk6w35qHW6ZsYyg98nq11W3c3cNt3n-bmpN4-ryqvXLmvFN1d8V9B1L-j-W2NRmxq7cyVwbW1t2G8v9fFFy3W4lbjq34wjKZjW39tvpT1WLvbzW1DhF_545GqZ-W5W34Q12Sg6J1W1SH7x88r06qGW8s_mjs98YcHcf2Y2tKM04 )

3. Commercial Search Intent is Where Revenue Lives

The most surprising finding? Rocket is virtually invisible for high-intent commercial terms.

For "mortgage lenders," they appear on page three of Google. For "mortgage calculator," they rank in position 40.

This forces them to spend $4 million monthly on paid search and affiliate commissions to get in front of the same users they could reach organically.

The lesson? Your content strategy must balance informational and commercial keyword targeting to maximise ROI.

Even Giants Make Mistakes

While Rocket's $824 million marketing budget dwarfs what most companies can spend, their strategy contains valuable lessons for businesses of all sizes and in any sector.

The most important takeaway?

You don't need to execute perfectly to grow rapidly — but focusing on the right priorities can save you millions.

In my latest analysis (https://email.exposureninja.com/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJx7f04/VW3q0Q49xbT2W8d-hmw6psyN9W87_Sgk5wg-pBN8DGmD43l5QzW6N1vHY6lZ3n0W3rzC0K8L0PgMW6g0wJq4H9hTmW64-Vp950YfBCW3MX9NV7CyhY-W4kfYfy1vLQ40W7BtfZF749VsyN7Dqhqfj4T7GW7vRc0k6F1rpGW5DFVbx444wCFW1gWgLS3BLf1GW2ZRpHV1hkK1FW55C3tV6zDhvJVmNHqq30dSYgW27zKXn8XNtrBW8yFPd_7225bHW6R01cZ7-yFszW3QTKpM6Khn7bW3SQYJn3HWDkYW4BR3pJ2QXJfsW3ls6JJ7hbs9lVB0twy3M2DRMW7gcmGH3y4N6Wf5vMjcT04 ) , I break down this strategy in detail, including:

• Exactly how to craft value propositions that convert like Rocket's

• Which content formats drive the most engagement in financial services

• Real examples of how we've helped mortgage providers balance informational and commercial search intent

• A game plan for implementing this for your business

Watch "Rocket Mortgage: A $5 Billion Marketing Success (and SEO Flaw) (https://email.exposureninja.com/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJx7f04/VW3q0Q49xbT2W8d-hmw6psyN9W87_Sgk5wg-pBN8DGmD43l5QzW6N1vHY6lZ3n0W3rzC0K8L0PgMW6g0wJq4H9hTmW64-Vp950YfBCW3MX9NV7CyhY-W4kfYfy1vLQ40W7BtfZF749VsyN7Dqhqfj4T7GW7vRc0k6F1rpGW5DFVbx444wCFW1gWgLS3BLf1GW2ZRpHV1hkK1FW55C3tV6zDhvJVmNHqq30dSYgW27zKXn8XNtrBW8yFPd_7225bHW6R01cZ7-yFszW3QTKpM6Khn7bW3SQYJn3HWDkYW4BR3pJ2QXJfsW3ls6JJ7hbs9lVB0twy3M2DRMW7gcmGH3y4N6Wf5vMjcT04 ) " and position yourself to capture high-value customers more efficiently than your competitors.
